word: Good Cooking, True Missionary Work. If your duty lies in the kitchen, seek to be a perfect cook. Prepare food which will be healthful, nourishing, and appetizing, so that the members of the family need not resort to stimulants of any kind. This is true missionary work.--Manuscript 47, 1896, p. 7. ("The Lack of Unity a Cause of Failure," undated.)
